Legacy search endpoint for backward compatibility

parameters.name: cityName
parameters.description: Name of the city to search offices in

parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
Page number to retrieve.If you provide invalid value the default page number will applied

Example: 1

Default Value: 1

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Number of records per page.

Example: 20

Default Value: 20

Max Value: 100

If provided value is greater than max value, max value will be applied.

parameters.name: filter.city
parameters.description:
Filter by city query param.

Format: filter.city={$not}:OPERATION:VALUE

Example: filter.city=$not:$like:John Doe&filter.city=like:John

Available Operations

  • $eq

parameters.name: filter.isActive
parameters.description:
Filter by isActive query param.

Format: filter.isActive={$not}:OPERATION:VALUE

Example: filter.isActive=$not:$like:John Doe&filter.isActive=like:John

Available Operations

  • $eq

parameters.name: filter.isVerified
parameters.description:
Filter by isVerified query param.

Format: filter.isVerified={$not}:OPERATION:VALUE

Example: filter.isVerified=$not:$like:John Doe&filter.isVerified=like:John

Available Operations

  • $eq

parameters.name: filter.isFeatured
parameters.description:
Filter by isFeatured query param.

Format: filter.isFeatured={$not}:OPERATION:VALUE

Example: filter.isFeatured=$not:$like:John Doe&filter.isFeatured=like:John

Available Operations

  • $eq

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description:
Parameter to sort by.

To sort by multiple fields, just provide query param multiple types. The order in url defines an order of sorting

Format: fieldName:DIRECTION

Example: sortBy=id:DESC&sortBy=createdAt:ASC

Default Value: createdAt:DESC

Available Fields

  • officeName
  • registrationNumber
  • currencyExchangeLicenseNumber
  • address
  • city
  • country
  • state
  • location
  • primaryPhoneNumber
  • secondaryPhoneNumber
  • thirdPhoneNumber
  • whatsappNumber
  • email
  • slug
  • isActive

parameters.name: search
parameters.description:
Search term to filter result values

Example: John

Default Value: No default value

parameters.name: searchBy
parameters.description:
List of fields to search by term to filter result values

Example: officeName,registrationNumber,currencyExchangeLicenseNumber,address

Default Value: By default all fields mentioned below will be used to search by term

Available Fields

  • officeName
  • registrationNumber
  • currencyExchangeLicenseNumber
  • address

201.description: File upload - returns single object for one file, array for multiple files

post.description: Allows office owners to create multiple FAQs in a single request. All FAQs will be associated with the authenticated user's office.

400.description: Invalid input data or validation errors

401.description: User not authenticated or office not found

post.summary: Create multiple FAQs for authenticated user office

post.description: Updates or creates currency rates for multiple offices identified by their slugs. If a rate exists for a currency, it will be updated. If not, a new rate will be created.
post.summary: Bulk update office rates for multiple offices

data.description: List of cities with their office information

logo.description: File upload response from the upload endpoint

example.question: What are your exchange rates?

officeSlugs.description: Array of office slugs to update

triggerType.description: Type of trigger for the alert. Must be either CITY or OFFICE
